Thundersnake.Description: A snake born from Zeus' thoughts.

Dreadman.Description: This man has been dreading the fact that he killed his wife 1000 years ago and roams the Earth in penitence for his actions

Grim Wraith.Description: A wraith sent to Earth by accident

Crimson Ghost.Description: A ghost whose opponents blood has made him crimson colored

Metalflayer.Description: A robot sent to kill all other machinery on Earth

HellHound.Description: Hade's own dog has come for dinner

Gutwrencher.Description: This fiend likes only one dish. Guts. Best served fresh

Corrupt Mumbler.Description: First of three worshipers looking for their savior.

Awful Mumbler.Description: Second of three worshipers looking for their savior

Weird Mumbler.Description: Third of three worshipers looking for their savior

Freeze.Description: The oponent can not attack next turn

Supreme Power.Descripcion: On next turn, player can use 3 cards without spending mana

Thief.Descripcion: Steal a random card from your oponent

Mana Seppuki.Descripcion: Sacrifice 50% of your mana, but duplicate your next attack
